title: 1916 White Sox Real Photo Postcard with Joe Jackson - Offers Wanted - Update 01/26
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: 1916 White Sox Real Photo Postcard with Joe Jackson - Offers Wanted - Update 01/26
posts.post_content:
I've had several Net54 members reach out to me about the availability of this card.  I've finally decided to let it go and wanted to give anyone interested an opportunity to acquire.

I'll be accepting offers for this wonderful postcard through Friday January 30, 7PM PST.

This is not an auction, offers from interested parties will not be disclosed, please do not ask.

No "top all" offers accepted.

About the card, no creases, staining on back does slightly affect the card front/image, note slight color difference in uniforms, slight corner/edge wear.  Joe Jackson seated, far right.

Please contact me with any other questions.

Thank you.

Jim

[url]jsrna@aol.com[/url]

Correction...the original post stated that the stain on the back does not affect the image.  Looking closer the stain has slightly discolored the image, note the difference in uniform color from white to off white.
Great card, Jim.  I don't think I've seen it before.  Good luck with the sale.
Second that, great postcard, Jim. Best of luck!
Amazing card, who was the lucky winner? :)

I received 5 offers, the postcard sold.

The Buyer is a Net54 member.

He has requested that his name and sale price details not be disclosed.

Thank you to those who took the time to provide an offer.

Jim
